author: Mike Beauchamp

commands.description: Send an email. (Doesn't actually send an email.)
commands.name: xet-send-mail

commands.description: Expires the password of an Active Directory user.
commands.name: xet-ad-expire-password

commands.description: Retrieves detailed information about a user account. The user can be specified by username, email address, or as an Active Directory Distinguished Name (DN).
commands.name: xet-ad-get-user

commands.description: Searches the simulated SIEM for events.
commands.name: xet-siem-search

commands.description: Fetches events from the XSOAR Engineer Training (XET) integration.
commands.name: xet-get-events

commands.description: Sets a new password for an Active Directory user.
commands.name: xet-ad-set-new-password

integration.description:
The XSOAR Engineer Training (XET) integration provides sample data to fetch events into Cortex XSOAR, and commands to build playbooks around.

Use for training purposes only.
integration.name: XSOAR Engineer Training (Community Contribution)

description: XSOAR Engineer Training (XET) Pack, this pack contains content utilized to train you on how to be an XSOAR Engineer.
name: XSOAR Engineer Training
readme:
# XSOAR Engineer Training 

This pack contains content used to train you on how to be a Cortex XSOAR Engineer as part of the XSOAR Engineer Training Series from Cortex Customer Success.

## XSOAR 8 Engineer Training Series

You can find the XSOAR Engineer Training series for Cortex XSOAR 8 on the Palo Alto Networks Live Community here: 

[Cortex XSOAR 8 Engineer Training](https://live.paloaltonetworks.com/t5/cortex-xsoar-how-to-videos/cortex-8-engineering-training-series/ta-p/562155)

## XSOAR 6.x Engineer Training Series

You can find the XSOAR Engineer Training series for Cortex XSOAR 6.x on the Palo Alto Networks Live Community here:

[Cortex XSOAR 6 Engineer Training](https://live.paloaltonetworks.com/t5/cortex-xsoar-how-to-videos/cortex-xsoar-how-to-customer-success-engineering-training-video/ta-p/484604)
